nodes.text: Toonbuck Toora was a female Sy Myrthian senator in the Galactic Senate during the final decades of the Galactic Republic, representing her homeworld of Sy Myrth. She was present in the Senate along with her aide, Ianad Cisma, within the Senate Building on the planet Coruscant when Queen Padmé Amidala of the planet Naboo addressed the Senate to resolve the Trade Federation's invasion of her homeworld.

Among with many other important senators, Toora came to support the Confederacy of Independent Systems, a separatist state lead by the Count of Serenno, Dooku. Toora wore a brown dress with hanging sleeve detail.
